welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Pennsboro, a quaint and charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Harrisburg International Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
